description_zh: 以当前角度向前移动对象。通常用于子弹和抛射物。
description_en: Move an object ahead at its current angle.  Typically used for bullets and projectiles.

conditions.description_en: Compare the current speed of the object.

conditions.description_zh: 比较子弹对象的移动距离。比较子弹累计经过的移动距离。
conditions.description_en: Compare the distance the object has travelled.

conditions.description_zh: 如果启用了步进模式，在每次触发步进时，用于进行额外的碰撞测试。
conditions.description_en: If stepping is enabled, triggers on each step for additional collision tests.

conditions.description_zh: 检测当前行为是否已启用。
conditions.description_en: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.description_zh: 设置对象当前的移动速度。

actions.description_en: Set the object's force of gravity.
Set the angle the object is moving at.

actions.description_zh: 将接触到目标对象的子弹反弹。
actions.description_en: Bounce the object off an object it is currently touching.
Set whether this behavior is enabled.

actions.description_zh: 设置子弹行为累计的移动距离。
actions.description_en: Change the counter used to track the distance travelled.

actions.description_zh: 在这一帧停止步进模式。
actions.description_en: Stop the stepping for this tick.

actions.description_zh: 启用后，子弹碰撞到实体对象时反弹。
actions.description_en: Set whether the 'Bounce off solids' property is enabled.

expressions.description_zh: 子弹的移动速度，以像素/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The current object speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.description_zh: 从静止状态到正常移动速度的加速度，以像素/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.description_zh: 子弹的移动角度，以像素/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The angle the object is currently moving at, in degrees.

expressions.description_zh: 子弹累计的移动距离，以像素为单位。
expressions.description_en: The distance, in pixels, the object has travelled so far.

expressions.description_zh: 子弹的重力，以像素/秒为单位。
expressions.description_en: The current gravity in pixels per second per second.

properties.description_zh: 对象移动的速度，以像素/秒为单位。
properties.description_en: The speed the object travels at, in pixels per second.

properties.description_zh: 从静止状态到正常移动速度的加速度，以像素/秒为单位。负值则减速。
properties.description_en: The rate of acceleration, in pixels per second per second.  Negative values decelerate.

properties.description_zh: 设置子弹的重力，以像素/秒为单位
properties.description_en: Gravity on the bullet, in pixels per second per second.

properties.description_zh: 子弹对象碰撞到具有 '实体' 行为的对象时，使子弹反弹。
properties.description_en: Make the object bounce off solid objects when it collides with them.

properties.description_zh: 启用后，将精灵图像的角度设置为运动角度。
properties.description_en: Automatically set the object's angle to the angle of motion.

properties.description_zh: 以更小的增量移动对象，避免因高速移动穿过实体对象。每次向前移动都将触发 '步进' 条件，以进行更高精度的碰撞测试。
properties.description_en: Move in small steps triggering 'On step', for making additional collision tests.

properties.description_zh: 游戏初始化时，是否默认启用该行为。
properties.description_en: Whether the behavior is initially enabled or disabled.
